benefit.p: Elans gain a +2 bonus to one ability score chosen at creation to represent their varied nature.
Aberrant Blood: Elans are of the humanoid (aberrant) subtype.
Elans gain the Wild Talent feat as a bonus feat at 1st level. If an elan takes levels in a psionic class, they instead gains the Psionic Talent feat.
Resistance (Su): Elans can use psionic energy to increase their resistance to various forms of attack.
As an immediate action, an elan can spend 1 power point to gain a +4 racial bonus on saving throws until the beginning of her next action.
Resilience (Su): When an elan takes damage, he can spend power points to reduce its severity.
As an immediate action, he can reduce the damage he is about to take by 2 hit points for every 1 power point he spends.
Repletion (Su): An elan can sustain his body without need of food or water. If he spends 1 power point, an elan does not need to eat or drink for 24 hours.
Psionic Aptitude: When an elan takes a level in a favored class, he can choose to gain an additional power point instead of a hit point or skill point.

elan.p: Medium: Elan are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
Normal Speed: Elans have a base speed of 30 feet.

Aberrant Nature: Although human in appearance, elans suffer from a nature slightly off from the rest of the non-elan society. They suffer a -1 penalty to Charisma-based skill checks when dealing with non-elans.
Naturally Psionic: Elans gain the Wild Talent feat as a bonus feat at 1st level. If an elan takes levels in a psionic class, she instead gains the Psionic Talent feat.

Resistance (Su): Elans can use psionic energy to increase their resistance to various forms of attack. As an immediate action, an elan can spend 1 power point to gain a +4 racial bonus on saving throws until the beginning of her next action.

Resilience (Su): When an elan takes damage, he can spend power points to reduce its severity. As an immediate action, he can reduce the damage he is about to take by 2 hit points for every 1 power point he spends.
Repletion (Su): An elan can sustain his body without need of food or water. If he spends 1 power point, an elan does not need to eat or drink for 24 hours.
Psionic Aptitude: When an elan takes a level in a favored class, he can choose to gain an additional power point instead of a hit point or skill point.
Languages: Elans begin play speaking Common. Elans with high Intelligence scores can choose any languages they want (except secret languages, such as Druidic).

rodofartifacermight.name: Rod of Artifacer Might

description.p: This artifacer version of the more famous rod of lordly might has no spell-like powers; however, when wielded by an artifacer, it increases all AC, attack roll, CMD, CMB, and saving throw bonuses from a artifacer's class traits by +1. The rod shares the mundane powers of a rod of lordly might, but its magical weapon forms are tailored to an Artifacers' preferences.

list.li: In its normal form, the rod can be used as a +1 returning light mace.
When button 1 is pushed, the rod becomes a +3 longspear.
When button 2 is pushed, the rod becomes a +4 heavy mace.
When button 3 is pushed, the rod becomes a +2 light crossbow or +2 heavy crossbow.

rodofartifacermight.prerequisites: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, Craft Rod, bull's strength, telekinesis, creator must be an artifacer
